My review:
     - Gameplay: 8/10, zombie shooter with annoying bot.
     - Story : - the game isn't story based, but you could listen their interaction, that's realy fun!
     - Visuals : 8.5/10, the visuals is quite enjoyable for an old game.
     - Sound : 8/10, the sound fits the situation very well.
"I recommend this game even if you guys play it in 2030! Remain the best co-op zombie shooter game of its time and today (together with L4D2). I hope game development pays attention to the existing issues (which aren't really many, not too few) including global server issues. Going on, I'd like to see this game have a remastered version XD."
     - Overall : 8,2/10 [I'm not joking about the remastered version.]

[h1] Game Details [/h1]
[list]
	[*]   [b] Game Name: [/b] Left 4 Dead
	[*]   [b] Game Release: [/b] 2008
	[*]   [b] Genre Tags: [/b] Survival, Horror, Shooter, Singleplayer, Co-op, First Person
	[*]   [b] Estimated Playtime: [/b] 100+ Hours
	[*]   [b] Personal Rating: [/b] 8/10
[/list]

[h1] Review [/h1]
[b] Summary - [/b] Left 4 Dead is a 2008 first-person shooter game developed by Valve South and published by Valve.Set during the aftermath of a zombie outbreak on the East Coast of the United States, the game pits its four protagonists, dubbed the "Survivors", against hordes of the infected.

[b] Story - [/b] The campaign is pretty simple. Well as simple as it can be. The campaign is divided into five levels. Each level is connected by a safehouse, which will be your goal to reach in each level. Every campaign has a finale which can be really tough depending on your difficulty. Each campaign does carry on to the next in terms of story. You have a total of six campaigns (DLC included)

[b] Gameplay - [/b] The gameplay was really unique when this game came out. Four survivors going against hordes of zombies and special infected that feel truly unique makes this game just so addicting to play. With a great amount of weapons and likable characters, I never got tired of hearing the characters' dialogue. If you die in game, you will respawn in a closet so you have to rely on your friends to get you out, or just wait until the next level as you will respawn back. The versus mode is really fun and if you have a part of eight players, well prepare for a long night of fun. I used to play this game on xbox 360 back on release with friends and we always played this game. It has a memorable place in my heart so I may be a bit biased when I say it's one of the best games ever made. Now if you are picking between Left 4 Dead or Left 4 Dead 2, honestly I would be Left 4 Dead 2. Okay now hear me out, Left 4 Dead 2 already has all the campaigns that Left 4 Dead has, and also steam workshop. I just find it hard to give a reason to go back into this game. Now if you are looking to bring in that nostalgia or curious about the original, you won’t be disappointed.

[b] Graphics - [/b] The graphics are pretty good for a 2008 game. Left 4 Dead has more of a charm compared to its Left 4 Dead 2 counterpart. The levels look really atmospheric and scary. The UI is really nice in this game, and I actually prefer this one over Left 4 Dead 2. The game runs really nice and had no crashes or stutters while playing this. Also the characters movement feels more “fluid and smooth” compared to Left 4 Dead 2, it’s hard t o explain so take that how you want.

[h1] Pros: [/h1]
[list]
	[*] Amazing sound design
	[*] Incredible level design
	[*] Unique enemies
	[*] addicting PVP
	[*] Huge hordes of zombies
	[*] Scary atmosphere
[/list]

[h1] Cons: [/h1]
[list]
	[*] AI can be dumb at times
	[*] Coop can be pretty easy
	[*] Content can get repetitive after a while
[/list]

SOlo 4 palabras: LOS JUEGOS SON  DIFERENTESS..Y EO ES BUENOO.. toda la snesacion del juego es diferente sin ser obia..las ideas originales y principales de lo que es left4 al maximo. left42 parece como si fuera un juego de estoss tiempos..pero l uno...CERO..tiene todo la pura RAZON DL LEFT 4 DEAD y lo malo, es es que el juego se qeuda corto..seria buenasoo que last stand estuviera en campañaa..ajajj o mas modos...!! pero no sigue igual de mecanicas jugables...con eso bastariaaaaa.ahhhhhhhh.. ah y las personas que viven por victorias del versus tambien.

Игра-легенда про зомби в которую приятно играть даже сейчас. Единственное, онлайн очень маленький, так как все играют во 2 часть и большинство людей, которые остались в этой части - задроты и токсики, так что если хотите поиграть в кайф, то зовите друзей. Хоть тут и намного меньше оружия, особых заражённых, режимов и кампаний, но зато остался свой шарм и куча багов и фичей, что позволяет приятно поностальгировать. Главный минус, пожалуй, это отсутствие мастерской, в которой можно скачать годные работы (скины, кампании, моды).

o jogo é muito bom, simples e divetido. a ambientação, o level design e os mapas do jogo no geral são incriveis, a campanha é muito boa e te prende ate o final, os modos versus e survival são extremamente divertidos e interessantes (principalmente o survival). os personagens são carismaticos e os zumbis especiais são incriveis assim como seus designs. incrivrl como um jogo simples conseguiu reinventar um genero inteiro no mundo dos games

Left 4 Dead series can give you one of the best co-op experiences ever but I hate one thing about them. I am old enough to remember rhetoric from Valve/developers about support of the game after the launch. Before the release they promised to support and update game for a long time instead of making sequel. But they did the opposite. And after they added all the content of the original to the sequel, the original became worthless.  I will never forget this lies.
